Blog.post: urlLink A classic example of an "Ogre Sleeps" Picture. Here we find the Ogre dozing on my old couches that my parents gave me when I moved out. True afficionados will notice the hand in hia pants. Posted by urlLink Hello

urlLink Here we have a nice shot of the Ogre and his woman Teresa. They're both sleeping on Ryan's green leather couch that we got from our old apartment. They're just too cute. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Here we have a watercolor picture of the Ogre scratching himself while he sleeps. In this photo, we can see Ryan is asleep on Ronen's old couch. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink This is one of the 1st pictures I have of Ryan sleeping. He loved that bean bag chair. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Jer Solar Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Jer in vegas Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink hey what do you expect? I have a B.A. in History from UCR. My emphasis was in 20th Century US History. Americans do need to think for themselves. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink What is Ryan doing to Joey? Especially when Teresa is sitting there right next to him. Whatever. Erica seems to think it's ok. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink When are all these people leaving? Don't they know it's our wedding night? Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink The happy couple...pictures like this give dopes like me some hope. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Classic wedding cake in the face. I think Holly took it easy on him. Who's head is that anyway? Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink My brother Joey and his friend Erica. It was good to see Erica. She looks great, no? Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink A few last minute jitters. Nothing to worry about right? Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink One of Rich's Best Men was Damon. Damon has been a homie since forever and a day and part of the orginal Mimi's crew. Look at him trying to pimp. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Ryan and Teresa's first picture as a couple. Don't they look cute? He's so lucky to find a girl like her. We still don't know what she sees in him... Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Mondo trying to find a seat. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink GZ and his woman waiting for the ceremony to start. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Ronen looking sharp. urlLink
urlLink Here he is...our handsome groom Rich. Posted by urlLink Hello
urlLink Doesn't Raquel look great? We squashed our gripes and decided to be nice to each other again. I'm sure T's real happy that we're friends again. urlLink
This blog is here for Ronen and Josephine. My two friends who are maddly in love.
